useCase.name: Manage Campers
useCase.description: As a Camp Worker, I want to manage campers' schedules and locations.

preconditions.precondition: The Camp Worker must be logged in.

successEndConditions.condition: The campers' schedules and locations are successfully displayed.

mainSequence.step: Camp Worker logs in to the Camp Management System.
System fetches the list of assigned campers for the Camp Worker.
System retrieves schedule and location information for each camper using the Camper Profiles and Scheduling Service databases.
System displays the list of campers along with their schedules and locations to the Camp Worker.
